title: Passports and visa documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, photo, biometrics, travel history
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Hotel clerks/police/border agents verify authenticity. Machine-readable zone + OCR-to-hash complement each other. Prevents fake passports. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
